/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the city's active transportation system. The street itself is lined with trees, adding a touch of greenery to the concrete jungle. Streetlights stand sentinel along the sidewalk, ready to illuminate the scene as dusk falls. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the cityscape.
